channel.title: Where can I find npc models?
channel.description: some npcs on my client don't have emotes they just look all messed up, where can I find the proper models?

item.title: Where can I find npc models?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

If you’re looking for the newer models of the NPCs then you may want to try the search bar for a dump of the models that fit to your NPCs. For instance, if you’re using 474 animations then search for the 474 model dump etc.

However, if you’re trying to change the animations of NPCs to other ones that are already in your cache and you don’t need to actually change the models then you want to open your class5 if it’s non-refactored and change these variables to the respective animations IDs for the NPC you are using.

class5.anInt77 = ####; //Stand anim class5.anInt67 = ####; //Walk anim class5.anInt58 = ####; //Walkback anim class5.anInt83 = ####; //Walk left anim class5.anInt55 = ####; //walk right anim

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I find npc models?
